jobDescription: Shift Type Job Title Data Analyst Education Associate Degree Location Houston - Houston, TX 77032 US (Primary) Career Level Entry Level Category GIS Analytics Date Needed By Job Type Contract Travel 0 - 10% Job DescriptionWe have an immediate Remote (Any Location U.S.) contract opening for a temporary Data Analyst.  The Data Analyst is responsible for the Quality Assurance /Quality Control of post-acquisition LiDAR data in preparation for final product generation.  Key Accountabilities Include: Feature coding – 2D / 3D feature coding of collected LiDar dataPlainmetric collection – Using MicroStation to create vectors for mapping purposesPLS – CADD modeling – Creation of the CADD file using weather, line load etc.Meteo reports – Creation of weather reportsPLS – CADD project and .bak file – creation of the final deliverables for clients # of Hires Needed 1 Exemption Type Hiring Manager Job RequirementsPost-secondary education in Geography, GIS and Geomatics is desirableSolid understanding of geodetic datum and projection transformation principles is desirableA commitment to quality and thorough approach to the workAbility to work well within a team environmentStrong technical aptitudeAbility to adapt and quickly learn how to use new software tools and approaches
